dialogue: Your tea, sir! With no milk or sugar, as requested.
Superb work...what was your name again, lad?
That's the one. Excellent job, Quinn!
I'd still like a coffee before the day ends, but this really hits the spot. Just in time for me to finish with your friend!
I watch as the boss enthusiastically ejaculates inside Emma, sipping his tea all the while.
This is the weirdest job I've ever had.
